document_data.name: Antherion
document_data.mainbody: An '''antherion''' was an animalistic [[shapechanger]] that could transform from an [[animal]] into a [[humanoid]], or an animal-humanoid hybrid.
document_data.Description: Antherions were essentially the opposites of [[lycanthrope]]s, which they were very often confused with. Antherion parents passed on their condition to their offspring, and could not pass it on by attacking foes. Their names often took the animal name as the prefix and ''were'' as the suffix.
document_data.Behavior: Antherions despised lycanthropes, just as lycanthropes despised antherions, and would attack them on sight.
document_data.Combat: Antherions often fought in their hybrid form, where they could make the best use of both humanoid and animal traits. Unlike lycanthropes, such creatures could only be hit by [[cold iron]], instead of [[silver]]. Both, however, were affected by [[magic]]al [[weapon]]s.
